nodes.text: R4-M6 was an R4-series astromech droid socketed into Mace Windu's Eta-2 Actis-class interceptor. The droid was destroyed during the Battle of Coruscant, after Mace Windu collided with a fleet of vulture droids and droid tri-fighters.
R4-M6 featured a silver dome and purple plating.
Hasbro released an action figure of R4-M6 in 2006.
